name: hand-drawn
description: Authentic imperfection and human touch. Wobbly multi-value border-radius, hard zero-blur offset shadows, Kalam marker headings, Patrick Hand body, dot-grid paper texture, tape and tack decorations, and the press-flat button mechanic. Spontaneous, creative, playful.
author: getdrip
signature_traits: Button press-flat: hover=2px shadow+translate, active=no shadow+full translate
Dot-grid paper texture on all section backgrounds
Kalam 700 on all headings — thick marker energy
Patrick Hand 400 on all body — legible but human
Jiggle on hover (±1deg shift at 100ms linear)
Tape strip decoration on cards (translucent gray rotated rectangle)
SVG hand-drawn squiggle connecting How It Works steps
SVG hand-drawn arrow annotation near hero CTA
Post-it yellow (#fff9c4) for feature highlight cards
Stat shapes: organic blob border-radius not circles
